1532222222222222222222212112112212.content:
When it was over. A female Virizion stood where Jodi use to be. Jodi looks over her new body and she was surprise by her form. "I-I'm a pokemon. How did this happen?" She ask.

"Are you okay Jodi?" Jodi recognize Damon's voice and looks down to see the little Shaymin she was holding. "Wait is that you Damon? Are you a Shaymin?" said Jodi.

"It is me. I was trying to change you into a Shaymin as well. But it looks like I use too much of my power on you already" said Damon. "What happen to you? How did you become this anyway?"

Damon then begins to explain to Jodi what happen after he got to the Island. Meanwhile Virizion returns to check on her future mate. But when she got there. She saw another Virizion, who is Jodi, there with Damon.

Virizion then get's jealous. "Who does she think she is? I saw that Shaymin first" Damon then stops explaining. "So that's what happen. A Virizion, like me, change you into a Shaymin" said Jodi.

"That's what happen. I'm sorry if I change you into a pokemon as well. It was the only way you could understand me" said Damon. "Jodi just smile as she nuzzles Damon softly.

"It's alright Damon. I'm just glad to be with you again. But I'm not sure I can get use to my new life" said Jodi. "Same goes for me as well. I'm very small now and your big" said Damon.

"I'll protect you then. I won't let any other pokemon hurt you" Suddenly Virizion appears before them. She was a little mad. "Get away from him. I saw that Shaymin first" said Virizion.

"Your the one who change Damon didn't you" said Jodi. "Yes I was going to change him into a male Virizion and make him my mate. But it backfire and he's now a Shaymin. So hand him over" said Virizion.

"Damon is staying with me" said Jodi. "Then we'll fight for him" Jodi and Virizion then begins to fight as Damon hides somewhere safe. Who won the battle?
1532222222222222222222212112112212.title: Virizion

15322222222222222222222121121122122.content:
Jodi fight Virizion, but she still don't get use with her new form because she's just become a Virizion some minutes ago. So she easily lose against Virizion. Once Virizion knocks her down, Jodi falls unconscious. Then Virizion goes to Damon where he's hiding and tell him to come with her, but Damon doesn't approved her attitude for what she has done to Jodi and refuses to go with her. So what happen next?

A: Virizion realizes what she has done and apologizes for her jealousy.

B: The rejection of Damon has breaking Virizion's heart, so Virizion leaves Damon as a Shaymin forever and left him alone with the unconscious injury Virizion as know Jodi and never see them again...
15322222222222222222222121121122122.title: Virizion win but...

153222222222222222222221211211221221.content:
Virizion starts to realize what she has done. She looks at the injured Jody. She has hurt one of Damon's friends, out of jealousy, and Damon now hates her for it. This was going to make it harder to make Damon her future mate. She had to apologize to him.

"Damon I'm sorry. I've hurt your friend because I was jealous when I saw her as a Virizion. So please forgive me and come with me"

She tries to get closer to him. But Damon backs away from her. "Stay back. Get away from me" Having been change into a Shaymin and becoming small begins to affect Damon. He felt a little scared being around Virizion after she hurt his friend.

"Damon please I'm not going to hurt you" Without saying anything. Damon runs away and into the tall grass where Virizion won't find him.

"Come back my love" Virizion tries to go after him without steeping on him. She starts to look for him. But the tall grass was hard to see such a small pokemon. She looks on the ground and hopes she didn't step on him and didn't kill him.

Virizion couldn't find him. "This is my fault. Damon is scared because I hurt one of his friends. What have I done? I need to find him"

What happens next?

Choice A. Damon finds other Shaymins.

Choice B. Virizion get's help to find her future mate.

Choice C. Jody wakes up injured and wonders what happen to Damon and Virizion
153222222222222222222221211211221221.title: Choice A

choices: Damon's other friends comes to the Island
1532222222222222222222212112112222.content:
Jodi's body then stops glowing as she looks over her new body. Her skin was now green. She was standing on four legs and had claws instead of Fingers and Toes.

A large flower had surrounded her neck as she realize it was much longer then usual. "W-what's going on? What happen to me? Why do I feel different?" Jodi ask.

"I can explain Jodi" Jodi then looks down and saw the Shaymin she was holding before. She then recognize the Shaymin's voice. It was Damon's voice. The boy she had a crush on.

"Damon is that you?" She ask. "It is Jodi. I have been change into a pokemon like you have" said Damon. "Like you have? What do you mean Damon?" said Jodi.

"I was going to change you into a Shaymin, like me, so you could understand me. But it seem I use too much of my power and have change you into a Meganium"

Jodi looks around and see's a lake. She goes over to it and see's a beautiful Meganium staring right back at her. Jodi seem surprise that she was change into a pokemon.

"I'm a Meganium" said Jodi. "Yes and a beautiful one as well" Jodi blush by Damon's comment. "Damon tell me. Why did you change into a Shaymin in the first place?"

Damon then begins to tell her of him, coming to the Island, and meeting Virizion and him changing into a Shaymin. "So that's what happen. Meaning you can't leave" said Jodi.

"I could, in my sky form, but I don't want to leave my pokemon behind. I'm sorry this happen to you Jodi" Jodi just smile. "It's alright Damon. If we have to. We can live on this Island together just you, me and your pokemon" said Jodi.

Damon then smiles. "Thanks Jodi"
1532222222222222222222212112112222.title: Meganium

15322222222222222222222121121122221.content:
As Damon's pokemons come back to Damon the Shaymin with Jodi the Meganium.
Jodi realizes she has also brought her pokemon as she founds her poke balls on her ripped clothes (the transformation has completely ripping her clothes). Jodi tries to use her new vines to pick her poke balls, but she has difficult so Damon's pokemon help her to open them for call her pokemons.

Meanwhile, Virizion comes back when she notices Jodi and more pokemons with Damon, she hides behind the bush without been spotted. She saws the ripped clothes as well and know what does it means...
"So another human has come in our island and I guess Damon must has change her into pokemon." Virizion watches them. "She and her pokemon seem to been friends of my future mate. Huh?" Virizion decides to wait and listen them before to show off...

Okay now, time to introduce Damon's and Jodi's pokemons. What pokemon they have? And what gender they are?
15322222222222222222222121121122221.title: Virizion comes back

153222222222222222222221211211222211.content:
Damon's pokemon.

Male Lucario: A pokemon that was raise, from an egg, and was a Riolu. Lucario had become good friends with Damon and vow's to protect him at all cost.

Female Ninetales: A pokemon abanded by her trainer. She got capture but was save from Damon. She owes Damon her life and travels with him until her debt is repaid.

Male Eevee: A playful pokemon who wanted to travel with a human trainer, for a long time, and become stronger as well. Eevee was know to be one of Damon's playful pokemon.

Female Buizel: A pokemon who wants to challenge any trainer that can beat her in battle. She battle Damon and lost and decided to travel with him on his journey.

Male Torterra: Damon's first starter pokemon that he got from Profesor Rowan who has been good friends, with Damon, ever since it first started off as a Turtwig.

Jodi's pokemon:

Female Dragonite: A pokemon who loves small and cute pokemon who also had a crush on Damon. Dragonite didn't like battling very much. But loves to be in contest. She also fell in love with Damon and hopes of turning him into her mate.

Male Buneary: Jodi's first pokemon she started with who Damon help capture it to be one of Jodi's pokemon so she can start her journey as a trainer and be with Damon.

Female Gardevoir: A pokemon that Jodi save, when it was still a Ralts, after being attack by some wild pokemon. Gardevoir protects her trainer from any danger that comes her way.

Damon and Jodi then begins to tell them what happen and told them they were going to live on the Island from now on. They didn't seem to mind and Jodi's Dragonite already has Damon around it's arms as it begins to pet Damon.

Virizion continues to watch. "Hmm they seem to be okay. Although I don't trust that Dragonite with my future mate. Maybe I should make my move now. Or wait and see what happens"
153222222222222222222221211211222211.title: Meet Damon's and Jodi's pokemons

15322222222222222222222121121122222.content:
Damon the Shaymin and Jodi the Meganium heard someone coming. Quickly they hide and watch. Soon they saw three familiars trainer and its Zach Damon's brother with Christ and Steven! What they doing here?

Jodi suggests Damon to change them into pokemon for they can understand them. Damon is unsure if he can do it again, but he decides to trying.

Damon come out of the stamp and walk bravely toward his brother and friends while Jodi stays hide and watch.

When Damon's friends notice Damon the Shaymin, of course they don't recognize him and want to capture him, but before they can do anything, Damon tries to concentrated his power again, but it seems he has difficult to using it as he does his best. Damon starts at glowing as his friends does and then..... BOOM!!

Jodi was in shock and come out of the stamp. Once the smoke is clear, she rushs towards Damon who is unconscious, she checks if he is alright, he looks fine he just pass out, then she looks at her three others friends and see they're unconscious as well and...
15322222222222222222222121121122222.title: Damon's other friends comes to the Island

153222222222222222222221211211222222.content:
Zach, Chris and Steven were now Shaymin's like Damon. The three friends starts to wake up and realize they were now pokemon. "Chris your a Shaymin now" said Zach.

"So are you Zach" said Chris. "Both of you are Shaymins" said Steven. "You too Steve" They start to panic when Jodi the Meganium tries to calm them down.

"Guys calm down" They look at the Megainum. "Is that you Jodi?" Zach ask. "Yes" Jodi responds. "What happen to you and where's my brother?" Zach ask.

Jodi then starts to explain and told them that Damon is now a Shaymin. "So a legendary pokemon did this to him and try to change us into pokemon" said Chris.

"He change me first. He wanted me to be a Shaymin too. But it seems he use too much power and change me into a Meganium" said Jodi. "Yet he was able to change us into Shaymins"

Zach goes to his unconscious Shaymin brother. "Is he going to be okay?" Zach ask. "I'm sure he's okay. We should find a place to keep him safe until he wakes up"

Jodi then holds Damon with her vhines, with a little trouble, and they look around the Island. They manage to find a cave and decided to make it their home base.

Damon's pokemon also follow as they were worried about their Shaymin trainer. Jodi lays near him. "We should find some food before he wakes up" said Chris.

"Right if were going to live like pokemon. We should make this Island our new home then with our pokemon" said Chris. "Damon change us into pokemon so we can understand him. If he's going to live like a pokemon. We should do the same" said Steven.

"I'm going to get some berries. There should be some on the Island" said Zach. "Be careful Zach" said Jodi. "Zach nods and heads out to find some food
153222222222222222222221211211222222.title: They're now Shaymins!

153222222222222222222221211212.content: Suddenly, they encounter the legendary pokemon...
153222222222222222222221211212.title: Damon and his pokemon encoutner another legenda...

choices: They find the place with all the Shaymins.
1532222222222222222222212112121.content:
Damon and his pokemon encounter the legendary pokemon Keldeo. Keldeo was good friends with Virizion and had a little crush on her. But he never told her how he felt for her.

Keldeo then comes across Damon and his pokemon as he approach them. He finds Damon immeditly. "Well I never thought I see a Shaymin surrounded by pokemon before" said Keldeo.

"These pokemon are my friends and they want to protect me" said Damon. "Your friends huh? Well it's nice to meet you then" Keldeo steps a little closer.

Riolu, one of Damon's pokemon, stops him. "Your not getting any closer to Damon" said Riolu. "Damon?" Keldeo ask. "That's me. It's alright Riolu I don't think he won't hurt us" said Damon.

Riolu understands and backs away. "It's nice to meet you then Damon. I am Keldeo" said Keldeo. "Nice to meet you Keldeo. These are all of my pokemon friends. You've met Riolu. My other friends are Buneary, Luxray, Torterra, Staravia and Buizell" said Damon.

"Nice to meet you all" said Keldeo. Buneary goes over to Riolu and the two starts to kiss. "What's up with those two?" Keldeo ask Damon. "Buneary and Riolu are in love and want to evolve into Lucario and Lopunny" said Damon.

"They do seem to be a cute couple. Hey I know a place where all the Shaymins like to hang out. Want me to show you?" Keldeo ask. "Sure we got nothing else to do" said Damon.

"Follow me then. I know where it is" Keldeo then takes the lead as Damon, and his pokemon, starts to follow him.
1532222222222222222222212112121.title: Keldeo!

15322222222222222222222122.content: Virizion changes Damon into a...
15322222222222222222222122.title: Fighting type

choices: Someone finds the two of them
153222222222222222222221221.content:
Virizion begins to use her power on Damon to change him. She begins to remember about Keldeo as well and how Damon almost remind her of Keldeo.

A long time ago. Virizion was on a mission with Keldeo. During the missing they encounter a tough pokemon. Virizion and Keldeo manage to beat him. But Keldeo got hurt.

She tried to get him out of the cave, that they were in, but it began to collapse. Keldeo manage to get Virizion out with the last of his strength as a pile of rocks block the entrance.

Virizion manage to move some rocks out, with help of other pokemon, but Keldeo was gone. She continue to search for him. Cobalion and Terrakion help out as well.

Virizion came to legendary so she could find him. Instead she found Damon. Thinking about Keldeo begins to change Damon into him as his body grew cream color fur.

His hands and feet morph into his new blue hoves. His hair then change into his new red mane. A cream color horn then appears on his forehead.

Blue fur cover his upper body. His eyebrows change into blue ridged eyebrows. A aqua like tail then comes out of his behind. A few changes later and Damon was a Keldeo.

Virizion stop and realize what she did. Damon look over his new body. "Whoa what did I turn into? I look awesome" said Damon. Virizion walks up to Damon.

"You have been change into a Keldeo" said Virizion. "Keldeo?" Damon ask. "A member of the sword of justice and a good friend of mine. Thinking about him must have change you into a Keldeo" said Virizion.

"Well this isn't so bad. It might be fun" said Damon. "Are you sure? I can change you into something else" said Virizion. "No it's alright Virizion. I'll have to get use to my new body though" said Damon.

"I can help you out Damon. It's the least I can do" said Virizion. "Thanks Virizion" said Damon.
153222222222222222222221221.title: Keldeo

choices: A legendary pokemon finds out about it
1532222222222222222222212221.content:
Virizion had somehow fallen in love with Damon and wants to make him her mate. She use all the power she had and transfer it to Damon.

A blind light then blinds everyone. When it was young. A strong handsome looking male Virzion was standing in place where Damon use to be.

Damon's pokemon just stare in awe. Damon looks over his new body and couldn't help but be in awe as well. "I'm a Virizion" said Damon.

"You sure are handsome" Virizion walks over to her future mate. He was a little taller then her. Male Virizions were a little bigger then the female.

"You like it?" She ask. "I'm not really sure. I feel great and all. But why did you change me into your own specie's Virizion?" Damon ask.

Virizion blush. "You see Damon. To tell you the truth. I have fallen in love with you at first sight. So I decided to make you into a handsome looking Virizion and make you my mate" said Virizion.

"You fell in love with me? That's why I'm a Virizion like you?" said Damon. "Yes Damon. What do you say handsome? Will you be my mate and live with me forever?"

Damon then finds himself blushing. He didn't know how he felt for her. He look into her eyes and saw she had the love for him. Damon was starting to have the same feelings as well. He smiles and gives her an answer.

"Yes Virizion. I'll be your mate" Virizion was happy. "Oh thank you Damon. The two Virizion loves stare into each others eyes and then share their first kiss together.
1532222222222222222222212221.title: Virizion

15322222222222222222222122211.content:
Damon, Virizion and the rest of his pokemon then left the Island to start their new life's. Damon retires from being a trainer and a human so he can live with Virizion.

His pokemon decided to go there separate ways and hope they can see their former trainer again one day. Virizion was happy to be with Damon.

Weeks pass since Damon started his new life. He had found a perfect home for him and his mate. Virizion had become pregnant and in a few days he will become a father.

Damon had come back home and brought some berry's for him and his mate. They both live in a very cozy cave for the two of them and their child.

Virizion was laying down waiting for her mate to return. Damon then retuns with dinner. Virizion looks at her mate with a smile.

"Welcome back my love" said Virizion. "It's good to be home my love" said Damon. The two Virizion lovers then begins to eat.

They then finish as Virizion looks at her pregnant belly. "I can't wait to have our child. I hope our child will be very healthy like us" said Virizion.

"I hope so too" said Damon. "Run any trouble on your way back?" She ask. "Nope. I made sure I didn't run into any trouble coming back" said Damon.

"I'm glad to hear that. I don't know what I will do if anything happen to you" said Virizion. The two mate then begins to nuzzle each other.

A few days later.
15322222222222222222222122211.title: They leave the Island

choices: Turn into a Terrakion like me.
1532222222222222222222221.content:
Damon begins to look around legendary Island to find the person who sent him the letter. As he look around he felt the ground shake a bit and wonder what the cause was.

He then went to check it out and found it to be one of the legendary pokemon. He has read about this one who goes by the name of Terrakion one of the sword of justice pokemon.

"Wow a legendary pokemon here on this Island. I should try and capture it. Damon takes out the masterball that was given to him on his birthday before heading out on his journey.

But before he could capture Terrakion. The ground shook again by Terrakion's strength. It was training to get stronger. This made Damon fell to the ground and makes him drop the master ball.

A tree fell and smash the master ball. "Great how am I going to capture Terrakion now?" Suddenly he felt pain in one of his legs. He look and saw a tree fell right on it.

Damon scream, in pain, and tries to break free. His scream got Terrakion's attention as he came upon Damon. "Are you okay?" He ask. "You can talk?" Damon ask.

"So can you. I heard your scream. What seems to be the problem?" Terrakion ask. "A tree fell and my leg got caught in it" said Damon. "Not a problem. Allow me to help you"

Terrakion use's his strength and removes the tree. "Thanks. But my leg is broken. I can't move" said Damon. "Stay here then and I'll go get help" said Terrakion as he left.

A few hours later. Terrakion comes back carrying something that look like a bottle. "What's that?" Damon ask. "Put this on your leg. It will heal your leg" said Terrakion.

Damon takes the bottle and opens it and spreads it on his leg. A brown liquid came out of it. Damon then felt he can move his leg again. It was heal as he stands up.

"Wow I feel better. Thank you Terrakion" said Damon. "Your welcome. I didn't catch your name" said Terrakion. "It's Damon" said Damon. "It was nice meeting you Damon. I must be off now" said Terrakion.

"Okay thanks for-" But before he could finish. Damon felt his leg getting stronger. His pant's then made a ripping sound and Damon was shock. His leg looks like Terrakions.

"M-my leg. It change and looks like yours" said Damon. "Yeah I was afraid of that" said Terrakion. "You knew?" Damon ask. "It was only suppose to heal other pokemon. We were told not to use it on humans. Now I know why" said Terrakion.

"Well what am I suppose to do then? I can't walk around with a leg like this" said Damon. "Well I can think of one idea that might work" said Terrakion. "What is it?" Damon ask. "You could
1532222222222222222222221.title: Damon meets Terrakion.

1532222222222222222222222.content: Does he meet the beautiful Cressila?
1532222222222222222222222.title: Cressila

153222222222222222222222222.content:
Damon has heard that there was a powerful legendary pokemon living on legendary Island that has come all the way from the Kalos region.

He has heard that there was some new and powerful pokemon, in Kalos, and wants to go there one day. Damon continues to look for the legendary pokemon and the person that send him the letter.

"Hmm I wonder who sent me this letter" Suddenly Damon heard a noise and decided to check it out. He get's to the source of the noise and saw a blue four legged pokemon standing there.

"Whoa I never seen a pokemon like that before. It must be the pokemon from Kalos. I'm going to try and catch it" He removes a masterball, from his bag, and get's close to the creature.

As he did. Damon trips and falls as the masterball from his hand. It landed close to the pokemon. The legendary pokemon see's the masterball and see's Damon. It smashes it and goes over to him.

"Oh no. It's going to hurt me" He begins to embrace the worst. But then he heard a calm female voice. "It's okay human. I'm not going to hurt you"

Damon looks up and see's the pokemon standing next to him. "You can talk?" Damon ask. "I'm using my fairy powers to talk with you. My name is Xerneas. What's your name?" She ask him.

"It's Damon" Damon replied. "Damon. I can sense you have a pure heart. Usually we punish humans for coming to our home. But I'll make an exception just this once" said Xerneas.

"Really?" Damon ask. "Yes I'll give you a gift to change into a fairy type pokemon. I'll also give you the ability to change back into a human whenever you want.

Damon has heard about fairy type pokemon. He has never met one before. Damon decides to accept Xerneas's gift. Maybe he'll be able to find the person, that send the letter to him, a lot easier now.

"Okay Xerneas I accept your gift" said Damon. "Very good. But please use this gift for good and not evil. If you I'll take it away from you" said Xerneas.

"I understand" said Damon. "Xerneas then begins to glow as she transfer her fairy powers to Damon. Which fairy type pokemon does Damon turn into?
153222222222222222222222222.title: Xerneas

1532222222222222222222222232.content:
Diancie had came to legendary Island to get away from her Carbink servents. Diancie is a princess and has always wanted to come to legendary Island.

But most of her Carbrink told her she can't go there unless one of them goes with her. So she sneaks out without one of them noticing she left.

Diancie had made it to legendary Island. But she learns that the Carbinks notice she left and went to search for her as Diancie looks for a good hiding spot.

"I don't want any of my servents to find me. I have to find a good hiding spot" Meanwhile Damon had arrive, on legendary Island, to find the person that sent him the letter.

As he starts to look around. Damon and Diancie both bump into each other as they both fall. "Sorry about that. I didn't see you there" said Damon.

"No I'm sorry. I should have watch where I was going" Damon then see's that he ran into a very rare pokemon. He was amaze to see Diancie.

"Whoa I never seen a pokemon like you" said Damon. "I didn't think I run into a human on this Island. Only legendary pokemon are allow here. I'm Diancie and you?" She ask.

"Damon" Diancie then got an idea how to get away from the Carbink. "Damon since we just met I'm feeling a little generous. Would you mind if I give you something?" said Diancie.

"Sure what is it?" Damon ask. "You'll see" Diancie was going to change Damon into a Diancie and have him take her place as the new Diancie.

Diancie use's her powers to change him. Does Damon become a Diancie or something

Damon continues to look around legendary Island. As he did he comes upon a strange ring on the Island. "What's a ring doing on this Island?" Suddenly a hand grabs him. This surprise Damon as he struggles. "Hey let go of me" He was then pull into the ring. Damon then finds himself on another part of the Island as he look around.

"Where am I?" He then heard a voice. "Who are you?" He looks to see a pokemon he never seen before. "I could ask you the same thing" said Damon. "I am Hoopa. Now tell me your name" said Hoopa. I want to show you something. Want to see?" Hoopa ask him. "Sure Hoopa" Hoopa then uses his ring and makes it appear on top of Damon.

info.brief_description: This is the sequal to Pokemon Transformation 3.
info.description:
This is the well known sequal to Pokemon Transformation 3.

The main Character is still Damon.

But maybe next story will be a different character next time.

Anyway this transformation is different.

Damon heads to a Isalnd where he got this mysterous letter and heads to another Island.

What he dosn't know is that legendary pokemon would meet him and they will turn him into any pokemon they want.

Like Pokemon Transformation 3. I'm going to let you guys add some chapters to this story as well.

So please make some additions to this story as well as Pokemon Transformation 3.
